Utterance: Ami apnar sathe ar kotha bolte chai na. Apnara sob same. Apnara sobai. Ami amar somoy nosto kore amar somoy nosto korchhi. Apni sob, apni sob eki. Apni bolchhen sob thik eki. Apni amake bhitore ashte bolchen, ebong shudhu, ami apnar sathe ar kotha borte chai na karon ami ekhane asi ebong ami kotha boli ebong ami kotha boli ebong ami kotha boli ebong ami er theke kichu pai na. Apni sob eki.
Apni jokhon bolben,
Apni sobai, apni sob therapy,
Thik ache, ami bolte chai, apni ja bolchen taate amar tin ta protikriya hochhe. Ami bolte chai, ek je apni bolchen apni sob eki ebong
Amra sobai eki. Apni sob eki. Apni bolchen jonno. Kichui kaj korche na. Thik. Kichui kaj korche na.
Ami bolte chai, ami ei mohorte onyo sobar sathe lumped bodh korchhi.

Thik ache, apni karon apni sob eki. Oboshoyi, apni shobaike jorito. Ami tomar alada korbo na. Apni kichu korchen na, karon apni apnake porichito korte, ekok aout. Tumi kichu koro na. Ei shob bimurto adhibhoutik upadan ache ebong kon konkrete nei. Eti thik koraar upay. Eti thik ache. Eti bhalo kintu?
Ami bolte chai, ei mohorte nirbiddho kichu ase je ami bolte pari ba korte pari je ta poronno korbe, apni je kichu bolchen je ta sob eki.

Ami kibhabe, apni kibhabe ami bindu A theke B bindute jete pari? Ami kibhabe bhalo perte pari? Ki hocche ta ami kibhabe thik korte pari? Mane, ei karonei ami ekhane eshechi. Thik? Ami bhebechilam jinishguli thik korte ami ekhane eshechi. Jinish bhalo kora
Tai apni ekti bakhay chai, ek dhoroner moto, sajano'r moto dhape dhape varnana
Kon kichur jonno amar kichu dorkar ache kichu dhore rakhar jonno kichu dorte hobe hyn.

Hyn. Dekhun, amar indriyo holo je apni janen je apni moriabhave kichu pete chan, apnake kichu ashar anubhuti dite. Ebong, ebong ami sottiye sakkhom hote chai, apni janen, apnake kichu dite kintu mone hochhe apnake, apnake chahida ba khelar tivrata somporko kichu ache. Ja, ja amar jonno sottiye emonobhave sara deoya kothin kore t么le je apnake je kichu dorkar tai deoya jay. Athoba, apni janen, eto rakha ekta bhalo upay holo, apni janen je apni je dhoroner jinish chai ba dorkar ba dorkar ta amader dujoner moddhe ekta jibonik process theke bere aste hobe ebong ete kichu ache. Apnar h么tashar tivrata ja amake je dorkar tai apnar jonno sottiye khulo ebong gr么honoyogyo hote kore tole.

Ami jebhabe achi ami sob somoy emonobhave bere ashi je ami sob somoy dol khai ami jinishguli pete chai. Tai akmatro upay ami pete je akmatro upay ami jani kivabe hote hoi. Ami duto upaye bere ashi. Ami hoi purno, shomporno throatol, sudhu purno, shomporno kato hoye bere ashi, sudhu baire ashe sudhu eibhabe kori ba ami kichui kori na. Sut么rang eta amar moto ekta upay ebong eta jotish upay ebong onno dike eta jotish upay ebong eta jotish upay ebong eta thik
Tai eta mato

Abhishap jodi tumi koro, abhishapto jodi ami abhishap na kori jodi ami na kori. Ami jodi sobar kache ek pothe jai, apni janen je eti ek pothe ba onno pothe parthokkho korte pare na ebong tarpor ami jodi shanto thaki ebong apni janen, shudhu bider modhye poro jan, tateo kichu jay ashe na. Tai.
Shune mone hochhe apnar kache kebal duto pochondo ache, thik je apni hoye akromon'er poristhiti'r kache jete paren, apni ubhoy bonduker sathe joljole janen. Eta boronno korrar ekta bhalo upay.
Eti ubhoy bonduk jolche.
Shothik ba ba bikolpo holo ek prokar sathe cholaphera kora ebong kono vabe nijeke apos kora. Thik. Thik. Je duto bhalo lage, konta kharap lage?

Thik achhe, bulk bonduk-guli jolte thakar shob somoyei bhalo lage karon ami jodi karo kache jai, apni janen, poorno shakti niye ebong, apni janen, tader mathay aghat kori, apni janen, ebong kewboli ebong kewboli tader dike jay. Emono jodi tara mukh phire ney, tate asle kichu jay ashe na. Karon ami itimodhye amar mukh patiyechi ebong tai jokhon ami boli, kintu jodi ami kichu na boli, ami keboli boshie thaki ebong kichu na kori, tahole eti amake shompurno bonduker moto ksipot kore tole. Sutonotai eti keboli tara amake khay, tobe eti amake ekhane khay ebong ami jodi etike keboli jhapsa kore die sob out kori tare cheye ami or beshi roganvit hoye uthi.

Thik. Haan, ami kolpona korte pari je thik sei adhikar, apni jodi shesh porjonto janen, antoto jodi apni sekhane duto bonduker sathe jolte thaken, emon ekta upay ache je apni nijeke kichu bhalo bodh korte paren, emon kintu apni apnar chahida porun korchhen na. Thik. Kintu kono na kono vabe tara, apni janen, dewar moto, eto amon je apni kono vabe nije kichu onsho danno korchhen. Sutonotai, ami bollam, apni janen, eto mone hochhe je apni janen, dobi da holo je apni shokol somoy apnar chahida metanor kono bhalo upay nei, thik. Apnar ekdhoroner nidarunbhabe kichu sotik proyojon, tobe eti mukhjhamajhi jage nei. Thik achhe. Sutonotai, apni janen, ami thik nischit nei je sei mukhjhamajhi jage ta ekhon thik ki. Kintu ami apnar sathe kaj korte icchhuk, apni janen, sei mukhjhamajhi mati ki ta abishkar korte satya-i kaj korte icchhuk. Je sorthok bale mone hochhe na?
Amake ekta mukhjhamajhi jage khujte hobe.
Thik achhe, kintu apni ekhon ki onubhob korchen?

Eta amake birkotto kore. Ami ekdike ba onno dike jete pari na. Etaar moto, ek jinish korrar chesta koro. Apni eti korte parben na ebong onno upaye chesta koro. Eta korte pare na. Shudhu ami shudhu atke achi.
Seikhane ekta sotyo dukkho ache.
Haan.
Amar dik theke takao. Amader jonno ki ghotoche er dhonno? Ekhane jeno mone hochhe. Apni kichu chaichen. Haan.
Amar emon kichu dorkar jeta ami nije pete parbo na.

Haan. Haan, ami, apni janen, ami shunechi je ami shunte pachi, apni janen, apni hotashar moto ebong ami apnar dukkho ebong apnar bedona ebong apnar hotashar kotha shuntechi. Apni janen, jokhon ami apnike shahajjo korar jonno amar joto sotyo chesta kori.
